name: Black Runescape RUNEMETRICS theme
description:
A theme for the Runescape RUNEMETRICS page. Just a simple black theme with transparency. This theme also removes the "Pay to View" elements and other non essential stuff from the page.
Note: Only works on the free version of runemetrics! I dont have the premium package, so I cant update it.
additional_info:
Version 1.0 Initial release. Have suggestions? Email me.
Version 1.1 Updated main page(clan block was added)
Version 1.2 Fixed some border colors
